external_references.description: Microsoft. (2014, March 12). Configuring Additional LSA Protection. Retrieved November 27, 2017.
Russinovich, M. (2016, January 4). Autoruns for Windows v13.51. Retrieved June 6, 2016.

description: With LSA Protection enabled, monitor the event logs (Events 3033 and 3063) for failed attempts to load LSA plug-ins and drivers. (Citation: Microsoft LSA Protection Mar 2014) Utilize the Sysinternals Autoruns/Autorunsc utility (Citation: TechNet Autoruns) to examine loaded drivers associated with the LSA.
